reviewText: This is such a beautiful romance! The comedy was hilarious, and the piano playing was spectacular - especially the piano battle! The ending is improbable, but the film works because of the likeable characters, great acting, beautiful music, and chemistry between the two leads. It's a stunning looking film, and made me want to visit China.
Very unique film that captures your interest until it dawns on you who the girl is. A bit slow at times but I find most chinese films are made that way.
